skins.shipDescription: I am the mastermind magician, Murasaki Shion! Come and be bewitched by my mature, seductive outfit!
skins.selfIntroduction: There's not a single enemy out there that can withstand the black magic of Shion, the genius magician! I'll show you how it's done! You ought to rely on me more~!
skins.acquisition: I am the mastermind magician, Murasaki Shion! Come and be bewitched by my mature, seductive outfit!
skins.login: Good morning, Commander! With my new look, I'll captivate everyone's hearts, both at home and on the high seas~!
skins.details: My figure and my height are both childlike? B-bug off! I'm a mature adult, and I'm amazing too! Commander, I'll make you understand how amazing I am soon enough!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Neee neee! Don't you think these anchor and bridge hair accessories are super cute?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Heheh~ Did my outfit catch your eye? Pretty sexy, isn't it? Of course it's my favorite~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Heheh~ In order to captivate everyone's hearts, I have to change up my image!
skins.secretaryTouch: Gotta put my hands next to my hat and smile~! Hehe, do you think I might be cut out to be an idol...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wooahh... Wh-wh-what is this all of a sudden...?! You surprised me…
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Hehe, everyone praises me by saying stuff like "You're amazing," or "You're so smart!" But you know, I'd like to hear some more creative praise~

skins.shipDescription: Here comes Murasaki Shion, Hololive's famous virtual magician! This world will bear witness to my brilliance!
skins.acquisition: Here comes Murasaki Shion, Hololive's famous virtual magician! This world will bear witness to my brilliance!
skins.login: Good morning, Commander! Feast your eyes upon my charms today as well! However~ Don't make me read any weird lines!!
skins.details: I'm showing too much skin? Ahah~ So you were totally seduced by my charms, Commander~ I see, I see! Perceiving hidden truths is a quality of a genius, as one would expect of a genius magician such as myself!
skins.secretaryIdle1: An endless broadcast... A studio that I can't leave... That won't happen to me if I become secretary, right?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Zzz... I'm not sleepy~ Gah! What time is it?! Nothing's happening, right?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Your stares are too conspicuous! But I understand what you're thinking! You're marvelling at how alluring I am!
skins.secretaryTouch: My hat is sentient! It'll move if I wiggle my eyebrows! Heheh, aren't I amazing?
